title: How much does the earth weigh?: measurement and mass
creator_credit: Reinald Werrenrath Jr and Goldberg-Werrenrath Productions
brief_description: Shows how to calculate the size and composition of the earth, explaining the difference between weight and mass using a spring scale and a balance scale. Also covers the scientific ideas of displacement, volume and density.
title_for_label: How much does the earth weigh?: measurement and mass
